title: Reclined / Supine Pigeon / Thread the Needle
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Lower your feet to the floor with an exhale. Change sides. Draw thigh toward chest Energetically push knee away from you Head and sacrum on floor Modification: Keep your lower foot on the floor. Avoid this pose if you have knee or hip injury.
